pkgmetadata.longdescription: Local Partial Likelihood Estimation and Simultaneous Confidence Band // Local partial likelihood estimation by Fan, Lin and Zhou(2006)doi:10.1214/009053605000000796 and simultaneous confidence band is a set of tools to test the covariates- biomarker interaction for survival data. Test for the covariates-biomarker interaction using the bootstrap method and the asymptotic method with simultaneous confidence band (Liu, Jiang and Chen (2015)doi:10.1002/sim.6563).
